016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.generator;
017
018import javax.faces.application.FacesMessage;
019import javax.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity;
020
021import de.cuioss.test.generator.Generators;
022import de.cuioss.test.generator.TypedGenerator;
023
024/**
025 * {@link TypedGenerator} for {@link Severity}
026 *
027 * @author Oliver Wolff
028 *
029 */
030public class MessageSeverityGenerator implements TypedGenerator<Severity> {
031
032    private final TypedGenerator<Severity> severities = Generators.fixedValues(FacesMessage.SEVERITY_ERROR,
033            FacesMessage.SEVERITY_FATAL, FacesMessage.SEVERITY_INFO, FacesMessage.SEVERITY_WARN);
034
035    @Override
036    public Class<Severity> getType() {
037        return Severity.class;
038    }
039
040    @Override
041    public Severity next() {
042        return severities.next();
043    }
044
045}
